Permanent Jurisdiction of Survivor Cases Involving Special Issues
The following special issues fall under the jurisdiction of the Philadelphia PMC:
any service prior to July 16, 1903
entitlement to benefits under a special act as provided in
38 CFR 3.801
, and
entitlement to a special allowance under
38 U.S.C 1312(a)
, and
38 CFR 3.804
.
